// Extra Top Say Colors
"Extra Top Say Colors"
{
	"palepink" // The color name
	{
		// The RGBA value
		"red"		"248" // Red value
		"green"		"195" // Green value
		"blue"		"195" // Blue value
		"alpha"		"255" // Alpha value, you'll probably want to keep this at 255
	}
	"greenishyellow"
	{
		"red"		"193"
		"green"		"253"
		"blue"		"64"
		"alpha"		"255"
	}
}
